view

Class BasicDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.BasicDisplay

  • public class BasicDisplay
extends java.lang.Object
    GUI for the chess board. This one is different in that it does no fancy checking. It just displays the board blindly.
    Author:
    marthaurion

      • clearBoard

        public void clearBoard()
        Remove borders on every square on the board. This might be more efficient than getting legal moves and deactivating them.
